hero.description: I'm a programmer passionate about technology, seeking my first professional experience. I have a strong desire to learn, grow, and contribute to projects that make a difference. I'm dedicated to constantly studying programming and developing practical and creative solutions.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I use in development

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the projects I've developed to demonstrate my skills

portfolio.title: Professional Portfolio
portfolio.description: Personal website developed with React, showcasing projects, technical skills, and professional experience with modern and responsive design.
features: Responsive and modern design with CSS animations
Organized sections for projects and skills
portfolio.challenges: Create an attractive interface that represented my professional identity, implementing smooth animations without compromising performance, and structuring code in a modular way to facilitate future updates.

expenses.title: Construction Expense Management System
expenses.description: Complete web application for controlling and monitoring expenses in construction projects, with interactive dashboard and detailed reports.
features: Interactive dashboard with charts and metrics
Expense control by category and sector
Responsive interface for mobile and desktop
expenses.challenges: Develop a robust system for construction financial management, implementing complex budget validations and creating intuitive data visualizations for engineers and managers.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's work together! Get in touch with me
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project in mind or would like to discuss possibilities, don't hesitate to get in touch.
